dcterms:creator: D. Lian
V.W. Zheng
X. Xie
dcterms:description: The Gowalla dataset includes information such as the geographic locations of user check-ins, timestamps, and the points of interest they checked into. It is a large-scale geographical location dataset, comprising millions of check-in records and hundreds of thousands of points of interest.
dcterms:title: Gowalla

dcterms:creator: S. Feng
G. Cong
B. An
Y.M. Chee
dcterms:description: Brightkite was a location-based social media network that allowed users to check in at locations after visiting them. It contains millions of check-in records and tens of thousands of points of interest.
dcterms:title: Brightkite

dcterms:creator: D. Lian
Q. Liu
E. Chen
dcterms:description: Weeplaces is a service that visualizes usersâ€™ check-in behavior on maps and has been integrated into several LBSN APIs. It is a medium-sized dataset comprising millions of check-in records and tens of thousands of points of interest.
dcterms:title: Weeplaces
